dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Tuesday, May 23, 2006 12:26 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion
Pictures]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures
Date:         Tue, 23 May 2006 09:57:15 -0700
From:         <Eddie_Huang@mpaa.org>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



Dear General Counsel,





Attached is a Cease and Deist notice regarding
http://www.boxedtvseries.com (69.93.90.71), which is hosted by
ThePlanet.com Internet Servies.



The offending website is selling illegal copies of our members?
copyrighted motion pictures.



We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.



Please feel free to contact me if needed.





Eddie Huang

Sr. Internet Case Coordinator

Motion Picture Association

Eddie_Huang@mpaa.org

818-995-6600 x 364




-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEc0XFvK/XpJs6oyURAmWzAJ9plXoD6Qr+SdUKKR4Fm0bv6SjfdACgmczm
RWmTmrYLMRAApg8oQRHUeI0=
=tgXy
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----


---Attached:---

MOTION PICTURE ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA, INC.
15503 VENTURA BOULEVARD
ENCINO, CALIFORNIA 91436
UNITED STATES

Anti-Piracy Operations
PHONE: (818) 728 - 8127
Email: antipiracy@copyright.org <mailto:antipiracy@copyright.org>

May 23, 2006

Name:        General Counsel
ISP:        ThePlanet.com Internet Services

Via Fax/Email

RE:                                Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures
Reference#:                        ThePlanet-10000 (M)
IP Address:                        69.93.90.71, http://www.boxedtvseries.com
Date of Infringement:                 May 22, 2006



Dear General Counsel:

The Motion Picture Association of America (MPAA) represents the following motion
picture production and distribution companies:

Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.
Disney Enterprises, Inc.
Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc.
Paramount Pictures Corporation
TriStar Pictures, Inc.
Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
United Artists Pictures, Inc.
United Artists Corporation
Universal City Studios, LLLP
Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.

We have received information that, on the above noted date, the IP address
69.93.90.71 (http://www.boxedtvseries.com) was used to sell or to materially
contribute to the selling of DVD copies of copyrighted motion pictures.  The
title(s) offered included, but were not limited to:

24 (http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=28&products_id=165)
Alias (http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=28&products_id=167)
"Bruce Willis Fans Pack"
(http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=28&products_id=629)
Buffy The Vampire Slayer 
(http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=28&products_id=191)
Charmed
(http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=28&products_id=599)
Friends
(http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=28&products_id=410)
"Harry Potter Collection"
(http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=28&products_id=402)
James Bond 007
(http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=28&products_id=172)
Lost (http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=28&products_id=607)
"Mission Impossible I& II"
(http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=28&products_id=408)

We believe this information should prove sufficient for you to locate the material
complained about herein; however, please don't hesitate to contact us with any
questions or clarification requests you may have.

The unauthorized distribution or public performance of copyrighted motion pictures
constitutes copyright infringement under the Copyright Act, Title 17 United States
Code Section 106(3)-(4). This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries,
international law, and/or treaty obligations.

As the owner of this IP address, we request that you immediately do the following:

1. Notify the end user of the infringement(s).
2. Remove or disable access to the material identified above.
3. Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms
of Service Agreement.

On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted
material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, pursuant to the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 512, that the
information in this notification is accurate and that we have a good faith belief
that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law.

Also pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, we hereby state, under
penalty of perjury, that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the
exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification.

Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email should
you have any questions.  Kindly include the above noted Reference # in the subject
line of all email correspondence.

We thank you for your cooperation in this matter.  Your prompt response is requested.

Respectfully,

Motion Picture Association of America
